description:
ICAR Milk Characteristics Codes and values - we have at this moment SCC, FAT, PROTEIN, LAC, UREA, BLOOD, ACETONE, BHB, LDH, PRO, AVGCOND, MAXCOND, AVGFLWR,  MAXFLWR, WEIGHT. E.g. SCC:123
        The following units have to be applied:
        |SCC 	        |Somatic cell count	                                |x1000 cells/ml	|NCL
        |FAT	        |Fat	                                                |%	        |VP
        |PROTEIN	|Protein	                                        |%	        |VP
        |LAC	        |Lactose	                                        |%	        |VP
        |UREA   	|Urea	                                                |mg/l	        |M1
        |BLOOD	        |Blood	                                                |true/false	|A99
        |ACETONE	|Acetone	                                        |mmol/l	        |M33
        |BHB	        |Beta hydroxybutyrate	                                |mmol/l	        |M33
        |LDH	        |Lactate dehydrogenase	                                |IU/l	        |
        |PRO	        |Progesteron	                                        |mmol/l	        |M33
        |AVGCOND	|Average conductivity value of the milk at 25 ° C	|mS/cm	        |H61
        |MAXCOND	|Maximum conductivity value of the milk at 25 ° C	|mS/cm	        |H61
        |AVGFLWR	|Average flow rate	                                |Kg/min	        |F31
        |MAXFLWR	|Max flow rate	                                        |Kg/min	        |F31
        |WEIGHT	        |Weight of animal	                                |Kg	        |KGM
        |PAG	        |Pregnancy associated glycoprotein	                |mmol/l	        |M33
